summary: The COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in over 100,000 reported deaths in the U.S., widespread unemployment, and an overall economic downturn. For the first time in history, major disaster declarations were issued simultaneously for all U.S. states, the District of Columbia, and U.S. territories. We testified about our work on FEMA’s role in the COVID-19 response and what our prior work suggests about future challenges for...
title: COVID-19: FEMA's Role in the Response and Related Challenges
